title: ugandja
author: ugandja
content: Hello everyone!I need a formula to calculate Dogecoin Scrypt miner daily profit. I saw this PHP formula somewhere(1 * 10000 * $hashes * 86400) / ($difficulty * pow(2,32))but that's clearly not what I need. It outputs wrong daily profit (not even close) compared to coinwarz. Best Regards,David

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Does such a formula exist?I would take the hashrate of 5 miners and their Doge profit on each pool, and I would get real income on each pool.If the statistics are closed, then the addresses of the mining pools can be easily found, and you will find out the addresses of the miners.https://miningpoolstats.stream/dogecoin
